service.name: updateProductQuickAdminName

service.name: updateProductQuickAdminShipping
service.description: Update product characteristics from Quick Admin

service.name: duplicateProduct
service.description: Duplicate a Product using a new productId

service.name: copyToProductVariants
service.description: Copy Virtual Product's data to the Variant Products

service.name: quickCreateVirtualWithVariants
service.description: This will create a virtual product and return its ID, and associate all of the variants with it. It will not put the selectable features on the virtual or standard features on the variant.

service.name: deleteProductKeywords
service.description: Delete all the keywords of a product

service.name: indexProductKeywords
service.description: Index the Keywords for a Product

service.name: forceIndexProductKeywords
service.description: Induce all the keywords of a product, ignoring the flag in the Product.autoCreateKeywords flag

service.name: findProductsById
service.description: Find the productId corresponding to a reference and a reference type

service.name: saveProductPriceChange
service.description: Save History of a ProductPrice Change

service.name: getSupplierProductFeatures
service.description: Finds a list of SupplierProductFeature entities based on the productFeatureId. If a partyId is given, only product feature information for that supplier party is returned.

service.name: duplicateProductCategory
service.description: Duplicate a Product Category using from oldProductCategoryId to a new productCategoryId

service.name: safeAddProductCategoryToCategory
service.description: Safe Add ProductCategory To Category (requires fromDate)

service.name: duplicateCategoryEntities
service.description: Duplicates a named entity from one productCategoryId to another

service.name: getProductFeaturesByType
service.description: Returns a map of productFeatureTypeId -> List of ProductFeatures. If supplied with a productFeatureCategoryId, the returned result is that of all product features in that category. Otherwise, if supplied with a productFeatureGroupId, the result is all features of that feature group. Otherwise, if there is a productId, the returned result is that of all features applied to that product. If the optional productFeatureApplTypeId is specified, only features with application of that type will be returned (this would only make sense along with a productId parameter.)

service.name: getAllExistingVariants
service.description: Takes a productId and a List of ProductFeatureAndAppl entities and returns a List of productIds which are existing varaints with those features applied.

service.name: getVariantCombinations
service.description: For a product, returns a List of all possible product feature combinations, based on all SELECTABLE features which are applied to the product. featureCombinations is a List of Maps with the following fields: defaultVariantProductId -> default productId for the variant, based on idCodes of the features curProductFeatureAndAppls -> List of product features to be applied to this variant existingVariantProductIds -> List of productIds of variants which already have these features

service.name: getCategoryVariantProducts
service.description: Takes a productCategoryId and a list of product features and resolves all the product category's product members from virtual to variant

service.name: updateProductIfAvailableFromShipment
service.description: If property is set (catalog.properties) this will re-activate (null discountinue date) on the product if inventory is available. Triggered via ECA by shipment receipt services
